he Wizards Three was a column by Ed Greenwood published in Dragon magazine. The series debuted in September 1992 (Dragon #185), describing a meeting between Elminster of Faer√ªn and Mordenkainen of Oerth where they discussed inviting Dalamar of Krynn to join them. The series ended in September 2007 (Dragon #359).
